minor.name: Cloning
minor.description: replace random mod with exact copy of another random mod

minor.name: Scourging
minor.description: add random negative mod, then equivalent-value positive mod. Repeated uses on same item replace both mods, increasing the min pt value of the negative by 1.

major.name: Combination
major.description: the mods of 2 chosen items are randomly distributed across the 2 items, ignoring baselimitations. each item then gains 1 random mod

major.name: Fate
major.description: lock in a mod and reroll all others

major.name: Empowerment
major.description: randomly apply 1 upgrade point; if impossible, adds new random mod

major.name: Attunement
major.description: Turn any non-relic into a relic, dynamically building thematic affixes as needed

major.name: Learning
major.description: Instantly level worn relic/attuned item; reroll if none

major.name: Negation
major.description: Chosen mod is negated, resultant points are distributed randomly

major.name: Sacrifice
major.description: Use on any lootable object or pile of gold, destroying it; roll on loot table, rerolling results lower than object's equivalent roll

major.name: Brittleness
major.description: body armour gets -1 AC and random hard tripled enchant
